sourceDesc.p: No source: created in electronic format.

encodingDesc.p: Encoding according to the CCH TEI Guidelines at http://abc.org

body.p: This is the 'beta' release of ncse and is subject to change. Corrections and improvements to the site will be incorporated in Version 1.0, scheduled for delivery in [].

list.item: Additional refinements to the facsimile repository,
Refinements to our automatic keyword extraction processes, to improve reliability and relevance of terms returned,
Inclusion within the keyword repository of additional materials from the corpus, and
Improved integration between the keyword and facsimile repositories.

body.p: As we tailor and improve these services we invite you to participate in a and comments are welcome through our Feedback form.
